test-set.name: xp-striding-grounded-motionlessH
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Grounded, RS: Motionless Ancestor-or-self axis not selecting U{element, document}} from self or ancestor-or-self axis selects nothing (if of unequal nodes), so grounded/motionless

test-case.name: xp-striding-grounded-motionlessH001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: grounded, RS: motionless Base expression: self::foo Separators: / With axes: ancestor-or-self With node types: attribute, namespace, comment, pi, text Invariant: node-type-unequal

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
